examples.example: 我一直向往能去北京，去领略那里的历史文化和独特魅力。

translate.english: I have always been longing to go to Beijing to appreciate the historical culture and unique charm there.

examples.example: 我希望有机会能再次去北京感受它的大气与繁华。

translate.english: I hope to have the opportunity to go to Beijing again to feel its grandeur and prosperity.

examples.example: 北京是一座充满活力和机遇的国际化大都市。

translate.english: Beijing is an international metropolis full of vitality and opportunities.
